data.title: Ghost hunter Dalen Spratt makes his way to UNM
data.meta_description: ASUNM’s Student Special Events (SSE) division is bringing the Halloween spirit to campus by hosting a spooky discussion with ghost hunter Dalen Spratt. Dalen Spratt is one of the three stars on the show “Ghost Brothers.” After having all experienced...
data.text:
ASUNM’s Student Special Events (SSE) division is bringing the Halloween spirit to campus by hosting a spooky discussion with ghost hunter Dalen Spratt.

Dalen Spratt is one of the three stars on the show “Ghost Brothers.”

After having all experienced paranormal activity in their youth, the trio come together to show the world that ghosts are real. They travel to some of the country’s most haunted locations where they provide a fresh and sometimes comedic outlook on the supernatural.

The night will begin with Spratt sharing videos and experiences as a ghost hunter; he’ll end with a Q&A.

This spooky discussion will happen Tuesday, Oct. 26 at 7:30 p.m. in Woodward Hall. Entry is free to students who present a UNM ID or vaccine card.
